subject: Two more files...
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
... from Rich's box 14
there's a lady named Kathy that keeps coming up, I think she's been there the
whole time for me, I've heard her voice from early on, and she repeatedly seems
to have a grumpy disposition. Kinda cynical. Very low tolerance for - well, it
seems like any attempt at humor, small talk or anything else that might disturb
or break down her sense of... dunno what... disdain at people? Seems really
bitter or fed up with something....
